keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The Defense Department has informed Congress that it intends to transfer up to a dozen more prisoners from the military prison in Cuba.

headline.print_headline: Pentagon Plans More Prisoner Transfers From Guantánamo
headline.main: Pentagon Plans More Prisoner Transfers From Guantánamo

snippet: The Defense Department has informed Congress that it intends to transfer up to a dozen more prisoners from the military prison in Cuba.
abstract: Defense Dept informs Congress it intends to transfer dozen prisoners from prison at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba; move would reduce population of 90 prisoners and bring Pres Obama's goal of closing prison closer to fruition; plan has been opposed by Republicans, and obstacles remain.
